faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing. Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

items.title: What is the refund policy?
items.description: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all our services. If you're not satisfied with the work, you can request a full refund within 30 days of the delivery date.

items.title: How long does it take to complete a project?
items.description: Project completion time varies depending on the scope and complexity. Typically, small projects can be completed within 1-2 days, while larger projects may take 5-7 days or more.

items.title: What payment methods do you accept?
items.description: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners.

items.title: Can I request revisions?
items.description: Yes, we offer unlimited revisions until you're completely satisfied with the work. Our goal is to ensure you get exactly what you need.

items.title: How do I communicate with the team?
items.description: You can communicate with our team through our platform's messaging system, email, or schedule a video call for more complex discussions.
